entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear early this evening. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 March 2023
